description: HTML source file for a web-based database visualizer interface, including structure, styles, and client-side scripts for dynamic data loading and interaction.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of available databases from the server and populates the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the list of databases and resets current selections.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses the database to show its tables.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Loads and displays the tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and renders data for a selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Generates HTML for displaying table data.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Renders individual cell contents, handling objects and long strings appropriately.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content for long or object data.
